content:
A mixture of Hbtap (0.076 g, 0.40 mmol), Co(NO3)2·6H2O (0.058 g, 0.20 mmol) and 12 ml distilled water was sealed in a 25-ml Teflon-lined stainless steel autoclave. The sealed vessel was heated to 120 °C for 48 h. Subsequently, the mixture was slowly cooled to ambient temperature over 24 h for crystallization. The pink block crystals of 1 were obtained and collected by filtration, washed with water for several times and dried in air. Yield 0.040 g (42 % based on Co). Anal. Calcd for C18H20CoN6O6: C, 45.5; H, 4.2; N, 17.7 %. Found: C, 45.2; H, 4.2; N, 17.9 %. IR (KBr, cm−1): 3,132 (s), 1,564 (s), 1,450 (m), 1,405 (s), 1,286 (w), 1,226 (m), 1,164 (w), 1,031 (w), 849 (w), 812 (w), 777 (m), 753 (s), 689 (s), 669 (w), 609 (w).

Synthesis of [Zn(btap)<sub>2</sub>(H<sub>2</sub>O)<sub>2</sub>]<sub><italic>n</italic></sub> (<bold>2</bold>)

Colorless block crystals of 2 were obtained in a manner similar to that used for the preparation of complex 1 except using Zn(NO3)2·6H2O (0.060 g, 0.20 mmol) in place of Co(NO3)2·6H2O. Yield 0.054 g (56 % based on Zn). Anal. Calcd for C18H20N6O6Zn: C, 44.9; H, 4.2; N, 17.5 %. Found: C, 44.4; H, 4.0; N, 17.4 %. IR (KBr, cm−1): 3,139 (m), 2,926 (m), 1,571 (s), 1,450 (m), 1,405 (s), 1,287 (s), 1,227 (m), 1,165 (w), 1,031 (w), 849 (m), 813 (m), 777 (m), 754 (s), 689 (s), 668 (m), 609 (m).

Synthesis of [Cd(btap)<sub>2</sub>(H<sub>2</sub>O)<sub>2</sub>]<sub><italic>n</italic></sub> (<bold>3</bold>)

Colorless block crystals of 3 were obtained in a manner similar to that used for the preparation of complex 1 except using Cd(NO3)2·4H2O (0.062 g, 0.20 mmol) in place of Co(NO3)2·6H2O. Yield 0.052 g (49 % based on Cd). Anal. Calcd for C18H20CdN6O6: C, 40.9; H, 3.8; N, 15.9 %. Found: C, 40.5; H, 4.0; N, 15.7 %. IR (KBr, cm−1): 3,182 (m), 2,968 (w), 1,567 (m), 1,448 (w), 1,405 (m), 1,284 (w), 1,226 (m), 1,166 (w), 1,141(w), 1,031 (w), 939 (w), 809 (w), 775 (m), 751 (s), 690 (m), 668 (m), 609 (m).

Synthesis of [Hg(btap)Cl]<sub><italic>n</italic></sub> (<bold>4</bold>)

Colorless block crystals of 4 were obtained in a manner similar to that used for the preparation of complex 1 except using HgCl2 (0.054 g, 0.20 mmol) in place of Co(NO3)2·6H2O. Yield 0.064 g (75 % based on Hg). Anal. Calcd for C9H8ClHgN3O2: C, 25.4; H, 1.9; N, 9.9 %. Found: C, 25.8; H, 1.5; N, 9.8 %. IR (KBr, cm−1): 3,584 (m), 3,527 (m), 3,065(w), 2,967 (w), 1,575 (s), 1,445 (m), 1,417 (s), 1,396 (s), 1,306 (m), 1,273 (m), 1,215 (m), 1,165 (m), 1,121 (w), 1,029 (w), 944 (w), 869 (m), 778 (m), 743 (s), 691 (m), 629 (w), 603 (w).

Synthesis of {[Ag(btap)]·H<sub>2</sub>O}<sub><italic>n</italic></sub> (<bold>5</bold>)

Colorless stick crystals of 5 were obtained in a manner similar to that used for the preparation of complex 1 except using AgNO3 (0.068 g, 0.40 mmol) in place of Co(NO3)2·6H2O. Yield 0.042 g (33 % based on Ag). Anal. Calcd for C9H10AgN3O3: C, 34.2; H, 3.2; N, 13.3 %. Found: C, 34.5; H, 3.4; N, 13.3 %. IR (KBr, cm−1): 3,429 (s), 2,973 (m), 1,582 (s), 1,453 (m), 1,404 (s), 1,270 (w), 1,219 (m), 1,163 (w), 1,052 (m), 864 (w), 771 (m), 746 (m), 693 (w), 605 (w).

Synthesis of [Co(btap)2(H2O)2]n (1)

A mixture of Hbtap (0.076 g, 0.40 mmol), Co(NO3)2⋅6H2O (0.058 g, 0.20 mmol) and 12 ml distilled water was sealed in a 25-ml Teflon-lined stainless steel autoclave. The sealed vessel was heated to 120 °C for 48 h. Subsequently, the mixture was slowly cooled to ambient temperature over 24 h for crystallization. The pink block crystals of 1 were obtained and collected by filtration, washed with water for several times and dried in air. Yield 0.040 g (42 % based on Co). Anal. Calcd for C18H20CoN6O6: C, 45.5; H, 4.2; N, 17.7 %. Found: C, 45.2; H, 4.2; N, 17.9 %. IR (KBr, cm-1): 3,132 (s), 1,564 (s), 1,450 (m), 1,405 (s), 1,286 (w), 1,226 (m), 1,164 (w), 1,031 (w), 849 (w), 812 (w), 777 (m), 753 (s), 689 (s), 669 (w), 609 (w).

Colorless block crystals of 2 were obtained in a manner similar to that used for the preparation of complex 1 except using Zn(NO3)2⋅6H2O (0.060 g, 0.20 mmol) in place of Co(NO3)2⋅6H2O. Yield 0.054 g (56 % based on Zn). Anal. Calcd for C18H20N6O6Zn: C, 44.9; H, 4.2; N, 17.5 %. Found: C, 44.4; H, 4.0; N, 17.4 %. IR (KBr, cm-1): 3,139 (m), 2,926 (m), 1,571 (s), 1,450 (m), 1,405 (s), 1,287 (s), 1,227 (m), 1,165 (w), 1,031 (w), 849 (m), 813 (m), 777 (m), 754 (s), 689 (s), 668 (m), 609 (m).

Colorless block crystals of 3 were obtained in a manner similar to that used for the preparation of complex 1 except using Cd(NO3)2⋅4H2O (0.062 g, 0.20 mmol) in place of Co(NO3)2⋅6H2O. Yield 0.052 g (49 % based on Cd). Anal. Calcd for C18H20CdN6O6: C, 40.9; H, 3.8; N, 15.9 %. Found: C, 40.5; H, 4.0; N, 15.7 %. IR (KBr, cm-1): 3,182 (m), 2,968 (w), 1,567 (m), 1,448 (w), 1,405 (m), 1,284 (w), 1,226 (m), 1,166 (w), 1,141(w), 1,031 (w), 939 (w), 809 (w), 775 (m), 751 (s), 690 (m), 668 (m), 609 (m).

IR (KBr, cm-1): 3,584 (m), 3,527 (m), 3,065(w), 2,967 (w), 1,575 (s), 1,445 (m), 1,417 (s), 1,396 (s), 1,306 (m), 1,273 (m), 1,215 (m), 1,165 (m), 1,121 (w), 1,029 (w), 944 (w), 869 (m), 778 (m), 743 (s), 691 (m), 629 (w), 603 (w).

Synthesis of {[Ag(btap)]⋅H2O}n (5)

Colorless stick crystals of 5 were obtained in a manner similar to that used for the preparation of complex 1 except using AgNO3 (0.068 g, 0.40 mmol) in place of Co(NO3)2⋅6H2O. Yield 0.042 g (33 % based on Ag). Anal. Calcd for C9H10AgN3O3: C, 34.2; H, 3.2; N, 13.3 %. Found: C, 34.5; H, 3.4; N, 13.3 %. IR (KBr, cm-1): 3,429 (s), 2,973 (m), 1,582 (s), 1,453 (m), 1,404 (s), 1,270 (w), 1,219 (m), 1,163 (w), 1,052 (m), 864 (w), 771 (m), 746 (m), 693 (w), 605 (w).
